tool_description: CodeROG Image Compressor API is a powerful service designed to optimize image files, supporting a wide range of formats including PNG, JPG, JPEG, WEBP, AVIF, SVG, GIF, and BMP. This API excels in reducing image sizes without compromising visual quality, making it an ideal solution for developers and businesses looking to enhance website and application performance. Seamlessly integrate this API to effortlessly compress images and improve loading times across various platforms.
name: Image Compressor API
title: Image Compressor API

api_list.name: Compress / Optimize Image

required_parameters.name: quality
required_parameters.description:
Quality Range: (0 to 100)
Higher = Better quality
Lower = More compression
